title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON, TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT (MOA) WITH THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY (PDEA) REGION IV-A, REPRESENTED BY ITS REGIONAL DIRECTOR FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF BALAY SILANGAN REFORMATION PROGRAM (BSRP) IN LOS BANOS, LAGUNA.
